summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6062 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South from Orcas Street to Graham Street; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82912 as amended by Ordinance No. 83411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
